body_html:
Hi @mrry, many thanks for your response ! Sadly the script only advised me to post a help message on github :( It issued the following:

ERROR: Failed to import the TensorFlow module.

  • Python version is 3.5.

  • TensorFlow is installed at: C:\Users\Gwendoline\Anaconda3\envs\tensorflow-gpu\lib\site-packages\tensorflow

  • All required DLLs are present. Please open an issue on the
    TensorFlow GitHub page: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues

body:
Hi @mrry, many thanks for your response ! Sadly the script only advised me to post a help message on github :( It issued the following:

ERROR: Failed to import the TensorFlow module.

- Python version is 3.5.

- TensorFlow is installed at: C:\Users\Gwendoline\Anaconda3\envs\tensorflow-gpu\lib\site-packages\tensorflow

- All required DLLs are present. Please open an issue on the
  TensorFlow GitHub page: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues
